page.title: 08Tolleshunt Knights Opinions
page.content: On June 28th my brother and I went outside the local shop in Tolleshunt Knights and asked these questions:- 1.Do you like living in Tolleshunt Knights? Most people said yes. 2.Would you like to see some changes in Tolleshunt Knights,if so,what? Most people said no,but one would like to see a swimming pool,and another,a golf course. 3.Do you think Tolleshunt Knights could do with some more shops? Everyone said no,because they visit Tiptree shops. 4.How long have you been living in Tolleshunt Knights? A.Knight =13 years,T.Johnson=20 years, R.Malyam =12 years,B.Knight =13 years, P.North =09 years,B.Wright =06 months A.Gammons=06 years. 5.What do you remember from years ago? Most said not a lot different.
